Messages.Author: Jacob Reinhard Kauffmann
Messages.Content: Dear all, today's lecture will be cancelled due to illness of the lecturer. Best wishes, Jacob

Messages.Author: Jacob Reinhard Kauffmann
Messages.Content: Dear all, Since there were no homework assignments this week, tomorrow’s exercise session is canceled. All other lectures and exercise sessions will take place as usual. Best, Jacob

Messages.Author: Jacob Reinhard Kauffmann
Messages.Content: Dear all, Please take 5-10 minutes to complete the course survey for the Machine Learning 2 module by July 12th, 2024. Survey Link: Survey Link Best, Jacob

Messages.Author: Jacob Reinhard Kauffmann
Messages.Content: Dear all, you can now register for the first exam (August 6, 11:30am-1:30pm) via Moses. Please check the prerequisites page again before registering. Machine Learning 2 (9 ECTS): module number #40551 Machine Learning 2-X (12 ECTS): module number #41173 Cheers, Jacob

Messages.Author: Hannah Marienwald
Messages.Content: Dear all, please note the following changes to the office hours for June and July: The office hours on the 11th, 28th, and 25th of June (Tuesdays) will be online. You can find the link below. The office hours on the 1st, 8th, and 15th of July (Mondays) will be in room MAR 4.003.  Link for online office hours: https://tu-berlin.zoom.us/j/61176080838?pwd=qKAsTgcajhCo475Dv1HHUrltXZx0X3.1

Messages.Author: Hannah Marienwald
Messages.Content: Reminder: for the next three weeks the office hours on Mondays and Tuesdays will be held in room MAR 4.003.

Messages.Author: Julio Cesar Uriostegui Sanchez
Messages.Content: Dear all, We are trying a new method for grading the homework, so please be patient with us during this transition. In the meantime, you can see the note for the theory part as a comment on your submission. Have a great weekend!

Messages.Author: Trisha Chetani
Messages.Content: Thank you, Julio. I see you are corrected all the programming for week 4 lecture.

Messages.Author: Hannah Marienwald
Messages.Content: Dear all, the office hour on the 3rd of June will take place in room: MAR 4057 at time:  3:45pm - 4:45pm, due to an internal event.

Messages.Author: Hannah Marienwald
Messages.Content: Correction: MAR 4.033

Messages.Author: Hannah Marienwald
Messages.Content: Dear all, Due to illness, today's office hour will be held online. I will later post a link.

Messages.Author: Jacob Reinhard Kauffmann
Messages.Content: Dear all, Please note the following changes for Thursday, May 2: Lecture: 12:00 PM in Room C130 Exercise Session: 2:00 PM in Room H0104 i.e. lecture and exercise session will be swapped this week. Cheers, Jacob

Messages.Author: Hannah Marienwald
Messages.Content: Dear students, starting from tomorrow, we will offer office hours between 2 and 4 pm on Mondays (MAR 4.033), Tuesdays (MAR 4.003), and Fridays (MAR 4.036). You are more than welcome to ask questions regarding the lectures or exercises. Please note that we will in general not be able to answer questions regarding your course of study, e.g., recognition of credits or formality of registration, in which case you may want to contact your examination office.

Messages.Author: Jacob Reinhard Kauffmann
Messages.Content: Dear all, I've uploaded Exercise Sheet 0 to the course page. This document reviews key concepts from Machine Learning 1. If you're new to the subject or need a refresher, please review this sheet. Join tomorrow's exercise session, where we show how to solve these exercises. Cheers, Jacob

Messages.Author: Marius Marsell
Messages.Content: which topics are relevant for the exam or are there topics that are not relevant for the exam? For example, Kernel Machines 4, for which there was no exercise.

Messages.Author: Jacob Reinhard Kauffmann
Messages.Content: Dear Marius,  all lectures and exercises are relevant for examination.  Cheers, Jacob

Messages.Author: Jonas Engler
Messages.Content: Hello, if possible, could upload the associated paper for the Kernel PCA lecture?  With kind regards

Messages.Author: Jacob Reinhard Kauffmann
Messages.Content: Dear Jonas, here is the paper for kernel PCA: https://alex.smola.org/papers/1998/SchSmoMul98.pdf and here for RDE: https://jmlr.csail.mit.edu/papers/volume9/braun08a/braun08a.pdf Cheers, Jacob

Messages.Author: Samuel Joshua Finn Gabriel Domdey
Messages.Content: Will there be lectures on the 11th and 18th of July? Best Samuel

Messages.Author: Jacob Reinhard Kauffmann
Messages.Content: Dear Samuel,  yes, there will be lectures this week and next week.  Best, Jacob

Messages.Author: Samuel Joshua Finn Gabriel Domdey
Messages.Content: Thanks for letting us know  Best

Messages.Author: Julio Cesar Uriostegui Sanchez
Messages.Content: For those interested in the GNN theory, the paper is cited in the slides:  Semi-supervised classification with graph convolutional networks: https://arxiv.org/pdf/1609.02907

Messages.Author: Can Kurt Kayser
Messages.Content: Hello, is it possible to have an oral or similar exam at an earlier date? I'm leaving for an ERASMUS exchange and it'd be helpful to be able to have the exam earlier than the 6th of August.

Messages.Author: Gabriella Vasconcelos Lara
Messages.Content: Hey, Today is monday, and I came for one of the office hours. However, I did not find anyone, and the room seemed to be occupied by a seminar. Was today’s hour postponed?

Messages.Author: Hannah Marienwald
Messages.Content: Sorry to hear that. Yes, it was announced on Friday. See: https://isis.tu-berlin.de/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=598073 Please come to another office hour so that we can discuss your questions and regularly check for announcments.

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Looking for another member for the Homework gourp

Messages.Content: Hey there! We've got a dynamic duo already motivated for the homework, but we're on the lookout for another study buddy or two to join our group. Interested in teaming up and tackling assignments together?

Messages.Author: Jacob Reinhard Kauffmann
Messages.Content: Dear Peilin,  the slides are now uploaded on the ISIS course page. Sorry for the delay.  Best, Jacob

Messages.Author: Bouraoui Hamadou
Messages.Content: I am also still looking for a group. How about we create one together?

Messages.Author: Can Kurt Kayser
Messages.Content: Hey what's up with the upload for the homework? Will we not get any feedback for the homework?

Messages.Author: Jacob Reinhard Kauffmann
Messages.Content: Dear Can,  is the submission link not working? https://isis.tu-berlin.de/mod/assign/view.php?id=1807482  Best, Jacob

Messages.Author: Can Kurt Kayser
Messages.Content: The deadline is set to 2023. I was also asking about the first two homeworks. Is it possible to get feedback on our solutions?

Messages.Author: Jacob Reinhard Kauffmann
Messages.Content: Dear Can,  thank you for pointing out the 2023 error!  The first two homework sheets are not graded. You can compare your solution to the one provided in the exercise session.  Best, Jacob

Messages.Author: Can Kurt Kayser
Messages.Content: Okay, thank you :)

Messages.Author: Yiwei Diao
Messages.Content: Hello, Is there still any group looking for a member? I've studied basic knowledge in ml and python before. Please send me a message if you're interested. Thanks!

Messages.Content: Hi Yivei!  We are a group of 2 with basic Ml knowledge would you like to join us for homeworks?  Thanks!

Messages.Author: Simon Luca Lösche
Messages.Content: Hi all, I want to register for ML2-X. The info on ISIS about the exam registration procedure makes it sound like registration is already possible, only that it will be accepted or declined based on the homework criterion. However when I try to register via Moses it says that "There are not any exams for this module in the selected semester."  Is this intended. Also, do I have to register for the seminar separately anywhere else? Thanks in advance! Kind regards Simon

Messages.Content: Hey, I am looking for homework partners :) just send me a DM!
